game.network

Class Protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.network.Protocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class Protocol
extends Object
implements Closeable
    This class represents a connection to a server implementing the Sepr Server-Client communication protocol

    • Constructor Detail

      • Protocol

        public Protocol(String hostname,
        int i,
        List<Class> toRegister)
        Attempt to connect to a server using the Sepr Server-Client communication protocol
        Parameters:
        hostname - The hostname of the server
        i - The port to connect on
        toRegister - A list of classes that will be registered for serialization. Any object that will be sent using this connection must be registered.

    • Method Detail

        public Message.Receivable getMessage()
        Returns:
        A message from the server, if one is available, otherwise null
